GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the selected article as an object

article.title: article title
article.author: Big Geoff
article.body: A day in the life of Geoff...

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments from the selected article as an array of comment objects
